Gensokyo:CrescentMoonSlash.NAME: Crescent Moon Slash
Gensokyo:CrescentMoonSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this kills an enemy, repeat this effect.

Gensokyo:MissMary.NAME: Miss Mary
Gensokyo:MissMary.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:SpontaneousHumanCombustion.NAME: Spontaneous Human Combustion
Gensokyo:SpontaneousHumanCombustion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, take !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! damage and increase the damage you will take from this power by !Gensokyo:SecondMagic!.

Gensokyo:RedCapeBlueCape.NAME: Red Cape Blue Cape
Gensokyo:RedCapeBlueCape.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add Red Cape and Blue Cape to your hand.
Gensokyo:RedCapeBlueCape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add Red Cape+ and Blue Cape+ to your hand.

Gensokyo:RedCape.NAME: Red Cape
Gensokyo:RedCape.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:BlueCape.NAME: Blue Cape
Gensokyo:BlueCape.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:TekeTeke.NAME: Teke Teke
Gensokyo:TekeTeke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! times to ALL enemies. NL If this brings an enemy below half HP, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

Gensokyo:HAARP.NAME: HAARP
Gensokyo:HAARP.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! Lightning.

Gensokyo:MenInBlack.NAME: Men in Black
Gensokyo:MenInBlack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:LittleGreenMen.NAME: Little Green Men
Gensokyo:LittleGreenMen.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Gensokyo:LittleGreenMen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E]. NL Put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:TurboGranny.NAME: Turbo Granny
Gensokyo:TurboGranny.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! Plated Armor.

Gensokyo:MonkeysPaw.NAME: Monkey's Paw
Gensokyo:MonkeysPaw.DESCRIPTION: Lose half of your current HP. NL Gain !M! Gold for each HP lost this way. NL Exhaust.

Gensokyo:ManorOfTheDishes.NAME: Manor of the Dishes
Gensokyo:ManorOfTheDishes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !Gensokyo:SecondMagic! cards, gain !M! Intangible.
